original_text: The Lord says, ‘People have forgotten how to be honest. They rob people and they store valuable things in their big houses. They become rich because they are so cruel.’
korean_text: 자기 궁궐에서 포학과 겁탈을 쌓는 자들이 바른 일 행할 줄을 모르느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: People have forgotten how to be honest
and they store valuable things in their big houses
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그들의 큰 집들에 귀중한 것들을 저장한다

sentences.original_text: They become rich because they are so cruel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너무 잔인하기 때문에 부자가 된다
